oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Andrew Jackson
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A color print of Andrew Jackson standing next to a tree. He is wearing a dark suit and is holding is hat and cane in one hand and his glove in the other. There is a white house in the background with a dirt path leading to it.
Caption, General Andrew Jackson, the hero, the sage and the patriot. Born, 15th March 1767. Died, 8th June 1845. We mourn our loss. Made upon Jackson's death.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Jackson, Andrew, 1767-1845
